nodes.text: Star Wars 62 is the sixty-second issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars. It was written by Kieron Gillen, illustrated by Andrea Broccardo, and published on March 6, 2019 by Marvel Comics.
THE SCOURGING OF SHU-TORUN: ROAD TO REVENGE! How is LEIA going to scourge SHU-TORUN? She'll need an all-star team…and a plan they won't see coming!
